summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District Number 1229, for the improvement of Twenty-first Avenue South, in the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to Washington Street, by grading the same and by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with such curbs, gutters and crosswalks as may be necessary, under Ordinance No. 13437, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
